subsection.name: A brief guide
subsection.p:
The links to the left give access to the latest war files.
Deploy the base war to Tomcat in the usual way.
Stop tomcat
Then take each subcomponent war in turn and unzip it over the top of the webapp's folder in Tomcat.
Restart Tomcat
*NOTE* As of today (30/3/04) the portal must be deployed to a webapp named "astrogrid-portal". It is anticipated that this restriction will be removed soon.
